summary: Be in a position involving and utilizing my marketing and management skills and knowledge gained throughout my education and on the job experience.

experience.title: Real Estate Marketing/Account Manager
experience.description: Responsible for maintaining and growing the Real Estate category; helps clients understand and utilize digital marketing platforms (audience targeting, SEM, SEO, SMO, email, Pinterest, video, rich media, content marketing); creates monthly reporting decks; analyzes Google Analytics; manages one of the company's largest digital campaigns.

experience.title: Healthcare Account Executive
experience.description: Grow and retain healthcare-related businesses; manage and maintain a large digital accounts; deep understanding of Audience Targeting, SEM, SEO, SMO, Email Blasts, Pinterest, Video ads, Rich Media, Content Marketing; tie campaigns to Google Analytics; translate analytics for clients.

experience.title: Real Estate/Executive Marketing Media Consultant
experience.description: Learn, understand, and sell all products of the media kit; manage own book of business; create marketing solution packages; campaign management using Google Analytics to optimize campaigns; involved in marketing committees; hit monthly sales goals; manage large local accounts.

experience.title: Marketing Intern
experience.company: The Conference Center at Shippensburg University
experience.description: Worked with customers, prepared documents, helped coordinate and set up events, sent e-blasts, trained with vizergy, helped design the Shippensburg Brochure; coordinated a networking event for 600 guests.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Greeted customers, assisted with choices, solved problems, processed sales and payments, built displays, unloaded and organized shipments, trained new hires.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Marketing and General Management
education.school: Shippensburg University, John L Grove College of Business
